isc_button.name: rollnow
isc_button.script: function onInit() if DB.getChild("ISC","bPendingRoll") ~= nil then onButtonPress() end end function onButtonPress() ISC.dbg("++immersive_results:rollnow:onButtonPress()") DB.deleteChild("ISC","bPendingRoll") wResultsList = window["results_panel"].subwindow["results_list"].getWindows() for _,w1 in pairs(wResultsList) do for _,w2 in pairs(w1.results_list_row_entries.getWindows()) do iscThrowMgr.throwDice(w2.getDatabaseNode()) end end ISC.dbg("--immersive_results:rollnow:onButtonPress()") end

windowlist.name: titles_list
windowlist.script: function addTitlesFromSource(pSource, nTitles) ISC.dbg("++results_panel:titles_list:addTitlesFromSource() pSource=["..pSource.."]") for _,nSkill in pairs(DB.getChildren(pSource)) do sSkill = nSkill.getChild("name").getValue() ISC.dbg(" results_panel:titles_list:addTitlesFromSource() original sSkill=["..sSkill.."]") bImmersive = (nSkill.getChild("immersive").getValue() ~= 0) ISC.updateImmskillSelection(sSkill, bImmersive) end ISC.dbg("--results_panel:titles_list:addTitlesFromSource()") end function onInit() ISC.dbg("++results_panel:titles_list:onInit()") nTitles = getDatabaseNode() addTitlesFromSource(ISC.datacommon_data, nTitles) addTitlesFromSource(ISC.dbskill_data, nTitles) ISC.dbg("--results_panel:titles_list:onInit()") end

stringfield.name: actor_number
stringfield.script: function refresh() sCharname = window["name"].getValue() sCharNum = sCharname:match("^.*%s(%d+)$") if sCharNum ~= nil then getDatabaseNode().setValue(sCharNum) setVisible(true) else getDatabaseNode().setValue(nil) setVisible(false) end end function onInit() DB.addHandler("combattracker.list","onChildAdded",refresh) DB.addHandler("combattracker.list.*.name","onUpdate",refresh) refresh() end function onClose() DB.removeHandler("combattracker.list","onChildAdded",refresh) DB.removeHandler("combattracker.list.*.name","onUpdate",refresh) end

windowlist.name: results_list_row_entries
windowlist.script:
function onImmskillUpdate(nUpdated) bImmersive = nUpdated.getValue() ~= 0 sSkillUpdated = nUpdated.getParent().getChild("name").getValue() for keyCT,nActor in pairs(DB.getChildren("combattracker.list")) do nImmskillActorResult = nActor.getChild("immskill_result") if bImmersive then -- add an entry nSkillAdded = nImmskillActorResult.createChild(sSkillUpdated) nSkillAdded.createChild("name","string").setValue(sSkillUpdated) nSkillAdded.createChild("label","string").setValue("+/-") nSkillAdded.createChild("total","number").setValue(-99) else -- search for this entry and delete it for sSkill,nSkill in pairs(nImmskillActorResult.getChildren()) do if nSkill.getChild("name").getValue() == sSkillUpdated then DB.deleteNode(nSkill) return end end end end end
function refresh() for keyCT,nActor in pairs(DB.getChildren("combattracker.list")) do nImmskillActorResult = nActor.getChild("immskill_result") if nImmskillActorResult ~= nil then for sSkill,nSkill in pairs(nImmskillActorResult.getChildren()) do if nSkill.getChild("name") == nil then DB.deleteNode(nSkill) else if DB.getChild(ISC.immskill_titles, nSkill.getChild("name").getValue()) == nil then DB.deleteNode(nSkill) end end end for _,n in pairs(DB.getChildren(ISC.immskill_titles)) do sSkillAdded = n.getChild("name").getValue() nSkillAdded = nImmskillActorResult.createChild(sSkillAdded) nSkillAdded.createChild("name","string").setValue(sSkillAdded) nLabel = nSkillAdded.createChild("label","string") nTotal = nSkillAdded.createChild("total","number") if nLabel.getValue() == "" then nLabel.setValue("new") nTotal.setValue(10) end end end end end
function onInit() ISC.dbg("++results_list_row:onInit()") DB.addHandler(ISC.datacommon_data .. ".*.immersive", "onUpdate", onImmskillUpdate) DB.addHandler(ISC.dbskill_data .. ".*.immersive", "onUpdate", onImmskillUpdate) refresh() ISC.dbg("--results_list_row:onInit()") end
function onClose() ISC.dbg("++results_list_row:onClose()") DB.removeHandler(ISC.datacommon_data .. ".*.immersive", "onUpdate", onImmskillUpdate) DB.removeHandler(ISC.dbskill_data .. ".*.immersive", "onUpdate", onImmskillUpdate) ISC.dbg("--results_list_row:onClose()") end
